Uses of Package
de.gnwi.psmilesviewer

  • Classes in de.gnwi.psmilesviewer used by de.gnwi.psmilesviewer 
    Class and Description
    AlternativeViewerPanel
    A JPanel extending object to display the PSmiles graph as in the ViewerPanel but giving the user an alternative zoom experience by using a JScrollPane.
    Constants.AddStructureOptions
    An enum for the different modes of adding a PSmiles structure from the library to the ViewerPanel's JTextArea that holds their language-dependent representations.
    Constants.ImageExportOptions
    An enum for the four different modes of exporting the PSmiles graph or the whole main frame that holds their language-dependent representations.
    Constants.Shape
    An enum for the GraphStream node shape options (see StyleConstants.Shape) that combines the language-dependent representation of each option with the keyword that must be added as an 'ui.style' attribute to a node.
    Controller
    The PSmiles Viewer application's controller.
    MainFrame
    The PSmiles Viewer application's main frame consisting of a JTabbedPane (that holds the ViewerPanel, the AlternativeViewerPanel, the StructureLibraryPanel) and a JPanel that serves as a status bar.
    StructureLibraryPanel
    A JPanel to present the user some exemplary PSMILES structures (loaded from a 'Structure.properties' file) that can be displayed in the ViewerPanel.
    UserPreferences
    A serializable class that preserves application and graph settings made by the user for the next start of the application.
    ViewerPanel
    A JPanel extending class where the user can enter a PSMILES line notation into a text area that will be displayed in a GraphStream ViewPanel underneath the text area.
